long_description: Keep all your essential gear dry and together in one place--this easy-to-handle tote offers ample space and a double-latch lid. Rubbermaid's durable construction features latches designed to accommodate your padlock. Large 48-gal. size holds bulky items with ease, making it perfect for organizing the garage or carrying gear in the back of your truck.
short_description: Keep all your essential gear dry and together in one place--this easy-to-handle tote offers ample space and a double-latch lid.
